channel.title: Can't connect to server on VPS?
channel.description:
I have No-IP DUC v3.0.4 up and running, IP Check is fine. I have uTorrent up with settings edited in (Preferences > Connection > Port 43594). I have exceptions added in Windows Firewall for the '43594' port. I have the ip changed in both ("[b]Gui.java[/b]")s on my desktop (computer I'm connecting from), but I still have a message saying "Error connecting to the server" when I try logging in.
Can someone help me with this? NO, you can't login to my VPS unless you're known.

item.title: Can't connect to server on VPS?
item.dc:creator: @Asuyuka Asuyuka
item.description:

I have No-IP DUC v3.0.4 up and running, IP Check is fine. I have uTorrent up with settings edited in (Preferences > Connection > Port 43594). I have the ip changed in both (“Gui.java”)s on my desktop (computer I’m connecting from), but I still have a message saying “Error connecting to the server” when I try logging in.

Can someone help me with this? NO, you can’t login to my VPS unless you’re known.
